description: The reality star sisters unveiled their new collection on Thursday; it is the first range of clothing form their eponymous line Kendall + Kylie, and the prices range from $68 to $498.
title: Kendall and Kylie Jenner debut their first own-brand clothing collection
title_page: Kendall and Kylie Jenner debut their first own-brand clothing collection | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kendall and Kylie Jenner have made their first independent foray into fashion, launching the debut collection from their eponymous clothing line, after years of working on collaborations with the likes of Topshop and Pacsun.
The reality star sisters unveiled the full collection, which is priced between $68 and $498, on Thursday, to the delight of their fans and fashionistas everywhere.
Although perhaps slightly cheaper than many of the high-end designer items the girls wear on a day-to-day basis - their favorite brands include Givenchy and Balmain - the collection has clearly been inspired the girls' own personal sense of style, and includes a number of crop tops, cut-out dresses, boho-inspired pieces, and, of course, plenty of shoes.
Scroll down for video
Dream team: Kendall and Kylie Jenner have just unveiled the debut collection from their eponymous Kendall + Kylie line
Moving forward: Both Kendall, 20, and Kylie, 18, explained that they feel the new collection shows how much their tastes have matured
Strike a pose: The collection features a number of pieces which reflect the girls' own personal style, including several crop-top ensembles, and cut-out dresses
Indeed, the range features a whopping 54 pairs of different high heels and sandals, according to Refinery 29, with each of the 16 core styles in the collection available in a variety of different colors, from neutral beiges and blacks to bright blues.
Staying true to their own preferred aesthetic, many of Kendall and Kylie's pieces have been designed using a neutral, toned-down color palette of black, blush pink, white and beige, with some brighter, bolder blues and edge metallics thrown in for good measure.
Indeed, many fashion fans and critics are claiming the collection is their most personal yet, when compared to their previous collaborations with much-loved brands like Topshop and Pacsun.
'The Kendall + Kylie collection has so many sophisticated pieces. I feel this is really just the beginning and it will become a HUGE brand,' one dedicated fan noted on Twitter, while another added: 'I literally want everything from the Kendall + Kylie collection. It's basically their wardrobe!'
Working hard: The reality stars' efforts have paid off - their collection has been incredibly well-received on social media
Spokesmodels: The sisters have been offering fans sneak peeks at their collection for weeks, and have even modeled some of the pieces from their range themselves
All about the shoes! The collection includes a whopping 54 pairs of footwear, from high heels to casual sandals
Speaking to Vogue about the launch of the collection - which will be available to buy on fashion e-tailer Revolve from January 29, and in stores like Bloomingdale's, Neiman Marcus and Nordstrom at the start of February - Kendall explained that both girls feel as though it represents their maturing tastes and experience with regard to fashion.
'This collection is really important to us because it’s a reflection of our point of view in the fashion world today,' Kendall explained. 'We’ve matured a lot in our tastes and aesthetics and are inspired by so many people in the industry, that creating this line is something we’re really proud of.'
'This collection is our most elevated and sophisticated, yet it’s so versatile. There’s something for everyone, no matter your age,' Kylie added. 'Kendall and I are excited to start wearing it and can’t wait to see our friends in it, too.'
Campaign stars: Although the girls have worn the clothes, they do not appear to model them in the ads for the collection
Lookalike: The model who was given the honor of showcasing the designs certainly bares an uncanny resemblance to the stars, with the same dark hair and lean physique
